title: Pixel first generation: phone not working (mic, speakers and app). Any solution?
content:
Have a Google Pixel first gen (Sailfish 5"; serial no. starting with FA722â€¦) purchased back in April 2017. 
Warranty expired, got the latest A10 ugrade in late December and since a week, the device started to act "funny": phone not ringing, deaf calls, no sounds, mic not working and the phone freezes and crashes when a call gets in. 
A phone restart seems to sometimes make things right again, but only for a very short time. 
Also, a "battery drain" problem has suddendly appeared. I tried factory reset, but to no avail. 
Reading a number of articles in the Community Support gave me the impression "it could be" a hardware problem, but need some hard evidence to corroborate that impression. 
Any help will be welcome: would love to fix the little guy and keep it. 
Cheers.
